TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeFieldReferenceExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents a reference to a field.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeFieldReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to a field.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the field. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression.FieldName%2A> property specifies the name of the field to reference.
## Examples The following example demonstrates use of a CodeFieldReferenceExpression to reference a field.
[!code-cpp[CodeReferenceExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codefie_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodeReferenceExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codefie_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CodeReferenceExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codefie_1.vb)]

Docs.param: A that indicates the object that contains the field.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified target object and field name.
Gets or sets the name of the field to reference.
Docs.value: A string containing the field name.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains the field to reference.
Docs.value: A that indicates the object that contains the field to reference.
